fields.summary: iOS TableViewRow structures for className meh does not match

comments.body:
Tested with:
SDK: 3.0.0 GA, 3.1.0.v20130108153753
Studio: 3.0.1.201212181159
Device: iPad2(v 5.1)

No error in the console stating that TableViewrow structures for classname meh do not match
